name: LogVariables
description: Logs predefined variables provided by Build or Release Management to the console.
author: André Marques de Araújo
helpMarkDown: Team Build provides a number of predefined variables that can be used in your build definition or in your build scripts. [More Information](https://www.visualstudio.com/docs/build/define/variables#predefined-variables)

inputs.name: agentVariables
inputs.label: Agent variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: These variables are generated by the agent in the scope of a particular build job prior to it starting.

inputs.name: buildVariables
inputs.label: Build variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: These variables are generated on the server side and are sent to the agent as part of the job.

inputs.name: commonVariables
inputs.label: Common variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: These variables are generated by the the agent.

inputs.name: releaseVariables
inputs.label: Release variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: These variables are generated on the server side and are sent to the agent as part of the job.

inputs.name: systemVariables
inputs.label: System variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: These variables are generated by the server and the agent.
